Plot: Art Kane, now deceased, coordinated a group photograph of all the top jazz musicians in NYC in the year 1958, for a piece in Esquire magazine. Just about every jazz musician at the time ...
Title: A Great Day in Harlem
Writer: Jean Bach, Susan Peehl, Matthew Seig
Actors: Quincy Jones, Dizzy Gillespie, Sonny Rollins, Buck Clayton
